pageContext.description: Wings slightly damaged. Edge broken off.
pageContext.patina: Dirty brown patina, removed in places after discovery by finder.
pageContext.other: Width: butt 20mm; centre 22mm; edge 45mm,Thickness: 31mm; 7mm,Weight: 12.5 oz = 354.369 gms
pageContext.collection: William Salt Library, Stafford,Deposited by Mr. John Deville,Morleys, Gayton, 20.iii.31
pageContext.site: England, staffordshire,chartley holme,found in a landship by the side of a brook [amerton?] n. of chartley castle, where the top of the wood turns e. found about 1830 by mr. john deville, father of the present owner. the stream's course has since altered.
